hero.title: Powerwise
hero.subtitle: More comfort. Less consumption.
hero.description1: Powerwise — our smart, AI-powered energy coach — helps you to lower your energy bills and to reduce your CO₂ footprint.
hero.description2: Get practical tips and personal insights that make an immediate impact. Join us and start saving today.
hero.aiCoachMessage: Turn down your thermostat by 1 degree

digitalEnergyCoach.title: Your digital energy coach
digitalEnergyCoach.description: Tailored to your home and habits.

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: From one-off tasks to smart investments that deliver lasting savings.

sustainableHabits.title: Sustainable Habits
sustainableHabits.description: Daily and weekly routines that permanently reduce your energy use.

progressMotivation.title: Progress & Motivation
progressMotivation.description: Earn energy-saving points, track streaks, and stay engaged.

localExpertise.title: Local Expertise
localExpertise.description: Built for the Dutch market — with knowledge of subsidies and best practices for Dutch households.

step1.title: Connect Your Home
step1.description: Tell us about your home and your motivation. Within minutes, you’re ready to start saving energy and money.

step2.title: Start saving
step2.description: Receive personalised actions and tips you can apply right away — from small daily habits to smart home investments.

step3.title: Score & improve
step3.description: Earn energy-saving points for every action, keep track of your streaks, and see how your choices add up to make a big impact.

municipalities.title: Working together for a more sustainable municipality
municipalities.description1: Research by TNO shows that energy coaches help residents make proven savings on their energy bills. Utrecht University found that gamification motivates people to maintain sustainable behaviours over time.
municipalities.description2: With Powerwise, we bring these two worlds together in one easy-to-use app that both guides and motivates residents to save energy.

environmentalImpact.title: Reach more residents
environmentalImpact.description: With Powerwise, we reach and motivate more households than traditional energy campaigns.

energySavings.title: Measurable impact
energySavings.description: See exactly which actions and habits are being adopted by your residents.

smartHome.title: Insights that strengthen policy
smartHome.description: Receive valuable, anonymised data on citizens' behaviour and motivation to make your policies even more effective.

tracking.title: Research-based
tracking.description: Built on proven methods from research and practice, designed specifically for the Dutch market.

about.title: Who we are
about.description: We are a father-and-son team with a shared passion for smart technology and a vision for a sustainable future. Driven by this mission, we develop solutions that directly contribute to lower energy costs and reduced CO₂ emissions.
about.description2: With Powerwise, we support households and municipalities in accelerating the energy transition step by step. In addition, we provide municipalities with valuable insights into the behaviour and motivation of their residents, enabling more effective policies and actions.

geert.name: Geert
geert.story: 10 years as a data analyst with societal impact at the Municipality of Amsterdam and NHG.

gerard.name: Gerard
gerard.story: IT & finance expert with a passion for technology.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description1: Powerwise ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and related services.
introduction.description2: By using Powerwise, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We are committed to transparency and will always inform you about how we handle your data.

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.item1: Name and contact information (email address, phone number)
personalData.item3: Energy consumption data and usage patterns
personalData.item4: Device information and app usage statistics

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.item1: App interaction patterns and feature usage

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
howWeUse.purpose1: To provide and maintain our energy coaching services
howWeUse.purpose2: To personalize your experience and provide relevant recommendations
howWeUse.purpose3: To track your progress and motivate continued energy savings
howWeUse.purpose4: To improve our app functionality and user experience
howWeUse.purpose5: To communicate important updates and energy-saving opportunities

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy and do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your explicit consent.
dataSharing.noThirdParty: We do not share personal data with third parties. Our servers are located in Europe, and we operate on a privacy by design principle. Full GDPR compliance is standard for us.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
dataSecurity.measure1: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
dataSecurity.measure2: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
dataSecurity.measure4: Compliance with EU data protection regulations

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.description: Under GDPR and other applicable data protection laws, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
yourRights.right1: Right to access and review your personal data
yourRights.right2: Right to correct inaccurate or incomplete information
yourRights.right3: Right to delete your personal data
yourRights.right4: Right to restrict or object to data processing
yourRights.right5: Right to data portability and transfer
